entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 05 January 2023
